title: Clementine and Cocoa Overnight Oats
directions: In a lidded container, stir together everything but the clementine sections and the almonds. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Serve with the clementine sections and the slivered almonds if using. I like to layer the clementines in between two layers of chocolatey oats
ingredients: 1/3 cup old-fashioned oats (be sure to use oats that are labeled gluten free if you're GF!)
1/2 cup peeled clementine sections, checked for seeds
